channel.title: Sixthstring
channel.description: Classical guitar music. Original compositions and arrangements.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Guitar Music for everyone.
channel.itunes:summary: I'm a music Librarian and classical guitarist living in New York City. This site is intended to be a place where I can post some of the things that I've been working on. Included here will be my original compositions as well as arrangements that I've made of some beautiful music. Newer post will be at the top. Hopefully, I will be posting on a semi-regular basis.
channel.itunes:author: James Mason

item.title: fugue (BWV 997)- J.S. Bach
item.description: The fuga from Bach's lute suite in c minor (BWV 997).
item.itunes:author: James Mason
item.itunes:keywords: bach, james mason, baroque, classical guitar, music,mp3, podcast

item.title: variation
item.description: Original composition for the classical guitar
item.itunes:summary: This is a slow, meditative piece written in a simple song form.
item.itunes:author: James Mason
item.itunes:keywords: james mason, original composition, classical guitar, music,mp3, podcast

item.title: allegretto - C.P.E. Bach
item.description: Second movement from a keyboard suite by C.P.E. Bach.
item.itunes:author: James Mason
item.itunes:keywords: bach, james mason, baroque, classical guitar, music,mp3, podcast

item.title: allegro - C.P.E. Bach
item.description: First movement from a keyboard suite by C.P.E. Bach.
item.itunes:summary: This is the first movement of a late keyboard sonata by C.P.E. Bach. Here it is transposed down a perfect fourth.
item.itunes:author: James Mason
item.itunes:keywords: bach, james mason, baroque, classical guitar, music,mp3, podcast

item.title: sonata k.308 - D. Scarlatti
item.description: One more Scarlatti sonata arranged for guitar.
item.itunes:summary: This sonata is marked Cantable and is quite lyrical.
item.itunes:author: James Mason
item.itunes:keywords: bach, james mason, baroque, scarlatti, classical guitar, music,mp3, podcast

item.title: sonata l.352 - D. Scarlatti
item.description: and another Scarlatti sonata on ther guitar.
item.itunes:author: James Mason
item.itunes:keywords: bach, james mason, baroque, scarlatti, classical guitar, music,mp3, podcast

item.title: presto di molto - C.P.E. Bach
item.description: Third movement of a C. Bach keyboard sonata.
item.itunes:author: James Mason
item.itunes:keywords: bach, james mason, baroque, scarlatti, classical guitar, music,mp3, podcast
